main event: On 15 Jun 60 at approximately 1930, three military personnel observed a bright unknown object in the sky while tracking it on Ground-Radar for about 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was tracked moving at about 500 mph,The sighting occurred approximately 6 miles southwest of Ft. Lawson Station,The object appeared metallic in color and left no exhaust trail,Three personnel were involved in the observation,The incident is documented as part of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright unknown object in the sky
location: 6.5 Miles S.L. Ft. Lawson Sta., Georgia, USA
